website_summaries.verdict: Adapting Hello Kitty’s extra-large head into the vacuum’s bottom was a clever and adorable idea, and it’s sure to be a hit for little helpers who love the color pink.
pros: Pink and white “dust” beads bounce around when vacuum is on
cons: A little on the noisy side

customer_reviews.title: Annoying, but great quality!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this toy well over a year ago and my daughter loved it. I finally got rid of it because this toy is so annoying! (Then again, aren’t most noisy toys?) this toy withstood so much without showing a hint of damage. Also, not once did I change the batteries since I bought this. It finally started to run out when I got rid of it. Also, take advantage of the “try me” part if your kid likes to turn things on and walk away, leaving them running forever until you go turn them off. The “try me” let’s it run for a few seconds then automatically turns off!
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed. Maybe the seller will replace
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter last Christmas. She is a gentle child and doesn't play with it every day. She usually uses it when I vaccum so she can help. I've had it about 3 months and it will no longer stay on. I changed the batteries and it still won't stay on. Very disappointed. Maybe the seller will replace. Will update if they do.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: ADORABLE! 2 toys in one
customer_reviews.text: Adorable, and all of the children who visit our home absolutely love it! The motor part of it lifts off as a "dust buster" type, so it's really two toys in one. The children think this is wonderfully clever. :) It's a favorite toy among the grandchildren, and some will bypass a room full of toys to go right to this.
customer_reviews.author: AnAmazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute, and fun little vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my daughter’s birthday since the theme was Hello Kitty and she likes to grab the dust pan and pretend to clean so I figured this would be a perfect gift for her and it was! She loves it, she likes to use it while I’m using the regular vacuum she likes to pretend like she’s helping.
customer_reviews.author: Viviana Galaviz

customer_reviews.title: Too short!
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this, absolutely adorable! but it's too short! I bought it for a 4 year old, thinking it was appropriate...but it's almost that she's too tall for it. She is not tall, average for her age. she had to bend slightly in order to move back and forth.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Item was defective! I will not purchase from amazon ...
customer_reviews.text: Item was defective! I will not purchase from amazon warehouse again. They obviously didn't check the item to see if it worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter adores this!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for granddaughter and she is in love with it! Perfect size for toddlers as it's not too big. Makes noise as if she is vacuuming herself. She is quite proud when she helps with cleaning!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Anticlimactic toy for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: The button is broken, there is no way to to switch the button from on and have it ever turn off as advertised. My 3 year old was excited when we open but the performance is unsatisfactory. I will try to return this and may purchase the Dyson version and hopefully she can have a properly functioning toy vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Jadrien

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved it as soon as she saw it but it did not turn on even after changing the batteries. She still played with it for a while but it is awfully annoying and squeaky everytime she pushes it around. We have laminated wood floors. It also squeaks on carpet.. cute toy but could be better
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Granddaugher loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I bought the Hello Kitty Vacuum Cleaner as a Christmas gift for our 23 month old granddaughter and it was a big hit. It's cute, seems well made, isn't too loud and it's just the right size for her. Very glad we purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Donna B.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Totally disappointed today when this arrived! Looks like it was a returned item. In plastic, zip ties not fastened and does work when pressing the try me button.
customer_reviews.author: Mnkdm

customer_reviews.title: Squeaky
customer_reviews.text: The toy is great minus the fact that is has squeaked since day one. There is no way to oil it because of how the wheels are on it so it is super annoying. Works great, kids love it, adults are very irritated with it.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: item is just as photos and description. really cute toy for the little ones, great to get them ready for the real life chores in their future haha. cute toy, and does everything described
customer_reviews.author: Luv2shopp

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: I loved that now she could pass the vacuum along with me. The noise scared her at the beginning but after a while she got used to it
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Flores

customer_reviews.title: Nice model
customer_reviews.text: I received the product with dead batteries. The sound of the vacuum is minimal and not bad. Cute vacuum design- my 2yr old loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Nunu

customer_reviews.title: Buy batteries because it is going to arrive with dead batteries!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it, BUT it came with dead batteries & its hard to let the vacuum down and my daughter is REALLY STRONG she can carry her mini chair and that is heavier than this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Terray

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our grandaughter for her 3rd birthday late October 2019. While visiting, I asked how she liked it...well it stopped working. Cute, but not sturdy. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M

customer_reviews.title: Piece of plastic junk!!! Don’t buy!!!
customer_reviews.text: I give one star for cuteness, but that’s it. This vacuum came with no batteries and when I tried to unscrew the product myself to place batteries in...there was no where to place them. The Springs flew out of a tiny compartment...this was a disappointment for my toddler and a big waste of time for me! Oh! There were no directions either. Don’t buy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tara C.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last a year and now the price has doubled.
customer_reviews.author: SLStitt

customer_reviews.title: I definitely would not recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: Broke within a week of having it. Sound was stuck in the ON position and the only way to turn off was to remove the batteries. I definitely would not recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a toddler
customer_reviews.text: Only downfall that the batteries that came with it did not work so it had to be replaced. Overall, great gift for a toddler.
customer_reviews.author: APReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy again.
customer_reviews.text: The power button gets stuck on and you have to hit it really hard to get it to pop out.
customer_reviews.author: kara andel

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I really was sceptical about ordering this for fear it wouldn't work. It's does though and it's very cute!! My daughter loves it!!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy but came Used
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and sturdy, BUT it was obviously used. Laying in box with all zip ties cut open and batteries dead.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: So cute
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect with grand! She helps grandma daily clean house!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, WANT REFUND
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a birthday gift for my granddaughter. The little beads inside that are suppose to fly around to look like it's running does nothing!! SINCE HER BIRTHDAY WAS ONE DAY PAST THE RETURN I'M STUCK WITH A BROKEN TOY!! Waste of money !! WOULD LOVE MY MONEY BACK!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s cute and appear sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my 2 yo grandchild she haven’t played with it yet I had to replace batteries as soon as it arrived because the light was not working
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Freshwater

customer_reviews.title: Great toy. Kids love it
customer_reviews.text: Great toy. Kids love it. My 2yo child was afraid of the vacuum. Now she vacuums along with me. Four stars instead of five, because The wheel on ours is a squeaky and a bit annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Mom

customer_reviews.title: The item was already opened!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little vacuum but it was already opened when I got it and that’s what I’m not happy about! You can clearly see in my photos that all the zip ties had been cut but one! So.... I consider this a used item not new!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Schellhamer

customer_reviews.title: Wheels were squeaky on the first one. had to order a new one
customer_reviews.text: Squeaky wheel on the first one, waited too long to return so i had to buy a new one so my kid wouldnt drive me crazy with loud ear piercing noises when she played with it. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Donut132

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly. Works great and little pull out vac ...
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. Easy assembly. Works great and little pull out vac is great too. Other ones I've purchased lose contact when in use with large vac and it turns whole unit off. This one doesn't do that.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: A great present
customer_reviews.text: A present for my 2 year old granddaughter and she absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Olive oil

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter really enjoys playing with it. The batteries die too fast though.
customer_reviews.author: Becks

customer_reviews.title: Super cute bought it for my granddaughter along with hello ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute bought it for my granddaughter along with hello kitty cafe set and grill. Perfect for hello kitty lovers
customer_reviews.author: Jenn Hall

customer_reviews.title: Cute play toy
customer_reviews.text: It's cute and my toddler plays with it here and there.
customer_reviews.author: Janet L.

customer_reviews.title: Annoying sound
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, my 3 year old boy & 19 month old girl both love it but the sound is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: zeppelinlover.meg

customer_reviews.title: Too bad this isn’t real
customer_reviews.text: Niece is chasing around the dog with this... loves it. Too bad this isn’t real!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie 06416

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy. My neice loves it. Was the perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Product was very cute but batteries drained really quick. ...
customer_reviews.text: Product was very cute but batteries drained really quick. My daughter only played with it when we vacuumed which was a few times a week for 5 mins at a time and the batteries drained after a couple days. Now it just sits, too expensive to constantly change out batteries.
customer_reviews.author: The LRP Team

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Super cute. Only thing is, when it came the batteries were dead. Glad that was the only issue. Once I replaced them, my daughter loved her new toy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It didnt work
customer_reviews.text: Its beautiful but didnt work, not even with batteries. My daughter was bummed
customer_reviews.author: Miriam M.

customer_reviews.title: Dod not work properly
customer_reviews.text: This toy vacuum did not work when batteries installed , but the kid still played with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: cute
customer_reviews.text: my grandbaby loves this. perfect size for a 2 yr toddler.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Baker

customer_reviews.title: Seller needs to make sure product is what it said it is
customer_reviews.text: Did not like that I paid $45 for it and the sticker on the package said $16... and it was dead... said it came with batteries but they were dead too
customer_reviews.author: Jim ehrmann

customer_reviews.title: Great squeaky vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what my niece wanted but can't get the wheel to stop squeaking when she pushes it.
customer_reviews.author: corey edelman

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Cheap product. Bought one and it stopped working...returned it but after few weeks the new one stopped working also. Dont waste ur money.
customer_reviews.author: Sujith abraham

customer_reviews.title: I do not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought The vacuum cleaner 3 months ago and now its not working.
customer_reviews.author: Betty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my tall 2 year old. She loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Kays

customer_reviews.title: Hello Kitty
customer_reviews.text: Great quality fir the price 2 year old niece loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Sharping

customer_reviews.title: It very simple item
customer_reviews.text: I like it but it needs to have more lights so the toddlers have more interest in it
customer_reviews.author: Marleny

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Adorable hopefully it works when she opens it for christmas
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: daughter loves it
customer_reviews.text: as described. Fast shipping! Saved a Santa present when the one we ordered from Toys R Us came broken!!!
customer_reviews.author: e

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's kind of cheap. Real quiet and only make one noise cute tho
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Bruns

customer_reviews.title: Daughter still loves it.
customer_reviews.text: Cute but turns off frequently. Must be a short in the wiring.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: It's suppose to light and the bubbles move around, but it doesn't
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sent me a used faulty product.
customer_reviews.text: Product was obviously a previously returned and used item. Packaging was ripped and cut open in places when i opened the box, paint was scratched and rubbed off on places of the vacuum, nothing but the light worked after we replaced the batteries that were already in the vacuum, no noise or movement of the foam beads. I Will be returning the item in hopes of reordering one that isn't a faulty product.
customer_reviews.author: Kelcie Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my 3 year old niece, and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Poor kitty
customer_reviews.text: This was a warehouse deal for me and the "cosmetic wear" was a little worse than I expected. It has a huge crack running through the part that blows little styrofoam balls around. They haven't escaped yet though and my toddler will probably end up breaking it anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Tetu

customer_reviews.title: Cute vacuum toy for the little ones that love to mimic
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this toy! Always copying myself or her mom when we start to vacuum the place. Overall it's a very detailed toy...it even has a roller with brushes on it like a real one that will spin (by hand only). It makes a decent amount of noise but thankfully there's a switch to set it to auto shut off after 5 seconds or permanent on until the power button is pushed.
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Cute but died fast
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and good quality in appearance but dead in less than a year. I'll probably be buying another one because my daughter loves it, but not good quality mechanically.
customer_reviews.author: AdorkableGeekGirl

customer_reviews.title: Lol but honestly it's a great product and a cute toy
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to vacuum with me. This was a prefect Christmas gift for her and it is really cute. BUT the wheel in the back squeaks and drives me NUTS! Lol but honestly it's a great product and a cute toy.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great price, well made!
customer_reviews.text: Very cute toy, a little on the small side so if your toddler is on the taller side I'd opt for a different toy vacuum. Colors are very vibrant and the Hello Kitty face on the front is adorable.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute item but the "Try me" feature was not working ...
customer_reviews.text: Cute item but the "Try me" feature was not working and this was a gift so... I'm hoping that the batteries were just dead and item was not broken!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Broken upon receipt
customer_reviews.text: Never worked from the day my niece received it in another state. Unfortunately her mom threw away the box and everything so I didn't bother to go through the return process
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: It was cute... But the package was ...
customer_reviews.text: It was cute ... But the package was ripped .. I was going to give it as a gift but not with a ripped package ...
customer_reviews.author: negdoone

customer_reviews.title: not 1 but 2 non-working  items received!
customer_reviews.text: received 1 and it didn't work. no lights - nothing. had a replacement sent....guess what??? ..... same thing!!! waiting on return instructions. this item is just a piece of junk in my opinion. this is when i wish i had bought from a real store.
customer_reviews.author: janjan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My niece absolutely loves this! We got it for her as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Chad216

customer_reviews.title: ... should light up and the Styrofoam should bubble up like a vacuum and it's
customer_reviews.text: So I received my package today opened it up and it's the hello Kitty vacuum and I got for my one-year-old granddaughter for her birthday only problem is it doesn't work it says push the bow and I should light up and the Styrofoam should bubble up like a vacuum and it's not
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Hello Kitty Vacuum Cleaner
product_meta.description: Tidying up has never been more adorable than with the delightful Hello Kitty Vacuum Cleaner! Roll the vacuum back and forth and press the heart shaped button for fun lights and realistic vacuum sounds! Remove the middle compartment of the vacuum to reveal a portable dust buster for even more fun cleaning play!
feature_bullets: Tidying up has never been more adorable than with the delightful Hello Kitty Vacuum Cleaner! Roll the vacuum back and forth and press the heart shaped button for fun lights and realistic vacuum sounds! Remove the middle compartment of the vacuum to reveal a portable dust buster for even more fun cleaning play!
Roll the vacuum back and forth and press the heart shaped button for fun lights and realistic vacuum sounds!
